entry.title: 150W LED Canopy Light, 5700K, 19000 Lumens, AC100-277V, DLC Premium, 525W HPS/HID Replacement, LED Gas Station Lighting
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Canopy
Price: 261.20

Canopy Lights come in a slim and sleek design with a 5700K color temperature giving you bright day-white light for your property. These LED lights consume 150W of energy to replace a fixture that consumes 525W saving you marginally on those hefty utility bills. The product comes with a die-cast aluminum built making the product robust and durable. With 19000 lumens of brightness, the product is a superior luminaire to HIDs and CFLs. Ideal for garage lighting and other commercial or residential applications. The LED garage lighting fixture is an IP65 approved luminaire making it perfect for damp and dusty environments. Save up to 75% on utility bills with LED lights and get peace of mind for your investment with a 5-year limited manufacturer’s warranty.
